description: After a fight with Akane, Ranma hits his head on the stone in the pond and thinks he`s really a girl. Girlish Ranma declares that she want to give up martial arts.

titles.title: Am I... Pretty? Ranma`s Declaration of Womanhood
Ranma est tombé sur la tête
Watashi tte Kirei? Ranma Onna Sengen
私ってきれい? 乱馬女宣言
